game.s_dis: Snail Bob 4: Space is a fun puzzle-platformer where players help Bob the snail travel through outer space, solve gravity-based puzzles, and overcome alien obstacles to find his way back to Earth.
game.l_dis:
Play Snail Bob 4 Unblocked – Space Puzzle Adventure

Snail Bob 4: Space takes Bob’s adventures beyond Earth! After being invited to test a rocket, Bob finds himself stranded on an alien planet. Players must help him survive and navigate through space-themed levels filled with buttons, levers, and gravity puzzles to make it safely home.

What is Snail Bob 4?

Snail Bob 4: Space is a puzzle-platformer that continues the beloved Snail Bob series with a cosmic twist. Set across dozens of levels, the game challenges players to manipulate environmental mechanisms, dodge enemies, and master gravity-based obstacles while keeping Bob safe.

How to Play Snail Bob 4

  • Move Bob: Click on Bob to start or stop his movement.
  • Use Levers & Buttons: Interact with the environment to open doors and control gravity.
  • Watch Out for Hazards: Avoid lasers, traps, and alien enemies.
  • Collect Stars: Find hidden stars in each level for higher scores and unlockables.
  • Reach the Exit: Guide Bob to the exit safely to progress through the story.

Why Play Snail Bob 4 Unblocked?

Play Snail Bob 4 unblocked online for free anytime! Enjoy space-themed puzzles, clever mechanics, and charming animations directly in your browser—no download or Flash required.

Key Features

  • Space Adventure: Explore outer space environments filled with new traps and alien creatures.
  • Interactive Puzzles: Manipulate gravity and use levers to guide Bob through each level.
  • Engaging Story: Help Bob return to Earth after being stranded on an alien planet.
  • Hidden Stars: Discover hidden stars in each level for extra rewards and achievements.
  • Family-Friendly Fun: Great for players of all ages with intuitive controls and clever puzzles.

Join Bob on His Space Mission!

Snail Bob 4: Space combines creative puzzles with a fun intergalactic storyline. Help Bob solve physics-based challenges, escape alien dangers, and find his way home!
